title: mutators documentation

This folder contains the documentation of the mutators.


# General info

In general, one can assume that mutators have the following design:
mutator ID, depth, number of params, params, underlying asset

At creation, a mutator won't have params, it will look like :
mutator ID, -2
A mutator must init itself if it finds a -2 at first pos.


## Summary


* 40001 : mut_RMM
* 40100 : mut_FIB
* 41000 : mut_G
* 42000 : mut_AC
* 42500 : mut_AM



# Details

You can find the IDs of the mutators in the Constants.hpp file.
Mutator IDs go from 40000 to 49999.
